title: Paris
description: A la carte reading ... all the sights, sounds and flavours of ParisGertrude Stein: on the origins of the croissantJulian Barnes: life begins in ParisJoanne Harris: chocolate in MontmartreAlex Kapranos: eating out in ParisKate Muir: red shoes in the Musee RodinAgnes Catherine Poirier: the lure of the Paris cafeMarcel Proust: that perfect erotic momentVictor Hugo: the view from the top of Notre-DameFaiza Guene: on not going up the Eiffel Tower... and over sixty other dazzling writers. The perfect companion for city breaks and for everyone who loves Paris.Introduced by Stephen Clarke, author of A Year in the MerdeOther titles in the series: Berlin, London, Dublin, Amsterdam, Venice, St Petersburg, Istanbul.
author: Heather Reyes
